    Responsive Warning Alert Email Template

    Get all 10 templates for $49
     

    Desktop preview

    Mobile preview

     

    Description

    Template for alerts and notifications. Use this for warning alerts where the user is notified about something they may need to pay attention to. Or change the background to any color you like. Clear messaging and call to action button. Nice and usable on mobile too.

    Features include

    • 10 Beautiful email templates
    • Responsive on mobile
    • Inlined CSS, embedded CSS and external stylesheet
    • 6 Column grid
    • Retina ready image assets
